response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, we estimate it's worth $1,200,000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an outstanding value, considering the product's true worth and the benefits it will bring to your endeavors. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
